items.title: 1.5 Environmental Interaction in Physical AI
items.description: Explore how Physical AI systems interact with and adapt to their environments.

items.title: Module 1 Capstone Project: Physical AI System Integration
items.description: Integrate all Module 1 concepts into a comprehensive Physical AI system demonstrating embodied cognition and environmental interaction.

items.description: Embodied cognition and environmental interaction in physical AI

items.description: Practical exercises to implement and understand embodied cognition and environmental interaction principles.

items.description: Test your understanding of embodied cognition and environmental interaction in Physical AI systems.
